mapper.select: SELECT ITSD.CODE_NO AS handle_code, ITSD2.CODE_NO AS tool_code, BM.MAT_CODE AS mat_code, BM.MAT_NAME AS mat_name, BM.LIFE_SALVAGE AS life_salvage FROM INV_TOOL_SPLIT_DETAIL ITSD JOIN TOOL_COMBINED TC ON TC.MAIN_TOOL_ID = ITSD.ID AND TC.IS_SPLIT = 0 JOIN TOOL_COMBINED_DETAILED TCD ON TCD.PID = TC.ID AND TCD.IS_SPLIT = 0 JOIN INV_TOOL_SPLIT_DETAIL ITSD2 ON ITSD2.ID = TCD.AUX_TOOL_ID JOIN BASE_MATERIAL BM ON BM.ID = ITSD2.MAT_ID order by ITSD.CODE_NO

SELECT COUNT(1) as count FROM INV_TOOL_SCRAP_DETAIL ITSD1, CJMADMIN.INV_TOOL_SPLIT_DETAIL ITSD12, CJMADMIN.BASE_MATERIAL BM WHERE ITSD12.id = ITSD1.SPLIT_ID AND ITSD1.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') + 1 AND BM.MAT_TYPE = '1f9107c5e4ba44948159211a49cc1da0' AND ITSD12.MAT_ID = BM.ID

SELECT count(1) as count FROM INV_TOOL_IN_DETAIL WHERE COMBINED_TYPE = '2' AND CREATE_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') + 1
